resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105409</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105409</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202752</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Cooperation, Trust, and Interdependence</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mitarbeit, Vertrauen und gegenseitige 
Abhängigkeit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Coopération, confiance, et interdépendance</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cooperação, confiança, e interdependência</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cooperazione, fiducia ed interdipendenza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συνεργασία, εμπιστοσύνη, και αλληλοεξάρτηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cooperación, confianza, e interdependencia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This activity involves two group initiatives designed to give students the opportunity to experience what it is like to depend on others for their safety. These initiatives will be used to explore trust, cooperation and interdependence while using problem-solving skills and effective communication.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Von anderen zu ihrer Sicherheit abhängen mit ein 
soll diese konzipiert sind Aktivität bezieht zwei Gruppe Initiativen,
die, um Kursteilnehmern die Gelegenheit zu geben, zu erfahren, was sie
wie. Diese Initiativen werden verwendet, um Vertrauen, Mitarbeit
und gegenseitige Abhängigkeit beim Verwenden der problemlösenden 
Fähigkeiten und der wirkungsvollen Kommunikation zu erforschen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette activité implique deux initiatives de 
groupe conçues pour donner à des étudiants l'occasion d'éprouver 
comme ce qu'elle doit dépendre de d'autres pour leur sûreté. 
Ces initiatives seront employées pour explorer la confiance, la
coopération et l'interdépendance tout en en utilisant des 
qualifications de résolution des problèmes et la transmission 
pertinente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta atividade envolve duas iniciativas do grupo 
projetadas dar a estudantes a oportunidade de experimentar o que deve 
como depender de outro para sua segurança. Estas iniciativas 
serão usadas explorar a confiança, a cooperação e a 
interdependência ao usar habilidades problem-solving e uma 
comunicação eficaz.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa attività coinvolge due iniziative del 
gruppo destinate per dare ad allievi l'occasione sperimentare che cosa
deve come dipendere da altri per la loro sicurezza. Queste 
iniziative saranno usate per esplorare la fiducia, la cooperazione e 
l'interdipendenza mentre usando le abilità per la risoluzione di 
problemi e la comunicazione efficace.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η δραστηριότητα περιλαμβάνει δύο ομαδικές 
πρωτοβουλίες με σκοπό να δώσουν στους σπουδαστές την ευκαιρία να 
δοκιμάσει τι πρόκειται όπως να εξαρτηθεί από άλλες για την 
ασφάλειά τους. Αυτές οι πρωτοβουλίες θα χρησιμοποιηθούν για
να ερευνήσουν την εμπιστοσύνη, τη συνεργασία και την 
αλληλοεξάρτηση χρησιμοποιώντας τις δεξιότητες επίλυσης 
προβλήματος και την αποτελεσματική επικοινωνία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta actividad implica dos iniciativas del grupo 
diseñadas para dar a estudiantes la oportunidad de experimentar como 
cuál es depender de otros para su seguridad. Estas iniciativas 
serán utilizadas para explorar confianza, la cooperación y la 
interdependencia mientras que usan habilidades problem-solving y la 
comunicación eficaz.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:LAURA JANSON
FN:LAURA JANSON
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202752</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105409</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/cooperation-trust-and-interdependence</uri>

  </manifestation>
</expression>
